animeDescription: Aesop is a trouble-making young boy who finds himself in another world filled with creatures he never believed to exist, such as fairies and talking donkeys. He sets off to find a way back to the normal world. On his journey he befriends many classical creatures from well-known fables and encounters many trials, each teaching him a valuable lesson.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Miwa Katsue', ['Theme Song Performance']], ["Koorogi '73", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Komori Akihiro', ['Theme Song Composition']]]
